AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF1_IPMF2_ACTION_DISABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Holds PMF Disables - If reset then the coresponding action may update the field otherwise, it remains unchanged.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF3_ACTION_DISABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Holds PMF Disables - If reset then the coresponding action may update the field otherwise, it remains unchanged.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_EPMF_ACTION_DISABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Holds PMF Disables - If reset then the coresponding action may update the field otherwise, it remains unchanged.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_ACE_ACTION_DISABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Holds PMF Disables - If reset then the coresponding action may update the field otherwise, it remains unchanged.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF1_IPMF2_GENERAL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This register holds the ingress PMF_1_2 unit enablers.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_A_DEFAULT_TCAM_ACTION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: If the TCAM returns "no-match", then the TCAM action will be replaced with Default Tcam Action.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_A_DEFAULT_MAPS_ACTION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: If the TCAM returns "no-match", then the TCAM action will be replaced with Default MAPS Action.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_A_DEFAULT_EXEM_ACTION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: If the TCAM returns "no-match", then the TCAM action will be replaced with Default EXEM Action.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_A_ACTION_DISABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Holds PMF Disables - If reset then the coresponding action may update the field otherwise, it remains unchanged.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_A_CPU_TRAP_CODE_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This is a table that maps an 9-bit CPU trap code to a forwarding action profile, used for the default key construction.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF3_GENERAL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This register holds the PMF_3 unit enablers.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_INGRESS_HEADER_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Maps each of 16 possible Header profile

Field.Description: If set, packets with this header-profile will generate FTMH
Field.Name: BUILD_FTMH

Field.Description: If set, packets with this header-profile will generate PPH
Field.Name: BUILD_PPH

Field.Description: If set, packets with this header-profile will generate UDH
Field.Name: BUILD_UDH

Field.Description: If set, then a PPH learn extension is always added to the PPH
Field.Name: ALWAYS_ADD_PPH_LEARN_EXT

Field.Description: If reset and learn data is not null, add learn extention
Field.Name: NEVER_ADD_PPH_LEARN_EXT

Field.Description: If system is uc and this bit is set add DSP EXT to the headers
Field.Name: ENABLE_STACKING_UC

Field.Description: If system is mc and this bit is set add DSP EXT to the headers
Field.Name: ENABLE_STACKING_MC

Field.Description: If set then FTMH MCID is taken from user header 218:0
Field.Name: MC_ID_IN_USER_HEADER_2

Field.Description: If set then FTMH Out Lif is taken from user header 218:0
Field.Name: OUT_LIF_IN_USER_HEADER_2

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_B_CPU_TRAP_CODE_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This is a table that maps an 9-bit CPU trap code to a forwarding action profile, used for the default key construction.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_STATE_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table provides access to IPPC_STATE_TABLE to allow static values set to the memory

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF1_L4_PROTOCOL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table checks the mapping protocol type to is L4.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_EPMF_L4_PROTOCOL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table checks the mapping protocol type to is L4.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF1_L4_OPS_RANGES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table provides access to L4 Ops ranges. Each range is set by minimum and maximum value.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF1_L4_OPS_RANGES_CFG_FIELD_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table controls the configuration of the range field select Extended L4 OPs in J2P

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF1_L4_OPS_ENCODE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table controls the configuration of the encoder of Extended L4 OPs in J2P

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF1_L4_OPS_RANGES_FFC_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table controls the configuration for Extended L4 OPs in J2P

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF1_L4_OPS_RANGES_OPERATOR_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table controls the configuration for Extended L4 OPs in J2P

AppDB.Name: FIELD_EPMF_L4_OPS_RANGES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table provides access to L4 Ops ranges. Each range is set by minimum and maximum value.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF1_OUT_LIF_RANGES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains registers that defines the Out-LIF ranges for program selection. Each range is set by minimum and maximum value.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF3_OUT_LIF_RANGES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains registers that defines the Out-LIF ranges for program selection. Each range is set by minimum and maximum value.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF1_PKT_HDR_SIZE_RANGE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Set of 3 registers used to define three packet headers size ranges. Each range is set by minimum and maximum value.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_MUX_MDB_INTERFACES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table holds selections for MUX for MDB interfaces, such as MAPS and EXEM.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_PP_PORT_INFO_IFWD
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table holds configurations to be made per in_port in stage iFWD.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_PP_PORT_INFO_IPMF1
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table holds configurations to be made per in_port in iPMF1.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_PP_PORT_INFO_IPMF3
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table holds configurations to be made per in_port in iPMF3.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_TM_PORT_INFO_IFWD
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table holds configurations to be made per PTC in stage iFWD.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_TM_PORT_INFO_IPMF1
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table holds configurations to be made per PTC in stage iPMF1.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_TM_PORT_INFO_IPMF3
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table holds configurations to be made per PTC in stage iPMF3.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_PMF_TM_PORT_INFO_EPMF
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table holds configurations to be made per out TM port in stage ePMF.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_IPMF1_CS_INLIF_PROFILE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table holds mapping of iPMF1 CS inlif profile mapping.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_ENABLE_DYNAMIC_MEMORY_ACCESS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table holds the enablers for Dynamic Memory Access memories. State table, CS hit indication, TCAM entry protection.

AppDB.Name: FIELD_ALGO_ACL_SUPER_GROUP_HANDLER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This Table configures the ALGO ACL Super Group Handler

AppDB.Name: FIELD_ALGO_ACL_TCAM_FG_PRIORITY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This Table configures ALGO ACL memory that resolves priority between TCAM A/C or B/D FGs
